name: PMM Architecture and Upgrade process.txt - Main Content
description: This section provides an overview of Percona Monitoring and Management (PMM), an open-source tool for monitoring MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and ProxySQL databases, as well as the servers they run on. It explains the architecture, deployment, and upgrade process of PMM within the Razorpay infrastructure. The section covers the main components of PMM, such as data collection, visualization, and security checks. It also provides links to the PMM Helm chart, deployment pipelines, and admin credentials for different environments.
use_cases: Monitoring and managing the performance of MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and ProxySQL databases
Visualizing database performance metrics in dashboards
Upgrading PMM to a newer version within the Razorpay infrastructure
capabilities: Collects thousands of performance metrics from databases and their hosts
Web UI for visualizing data in dashboards
Deployment using Helm charts and Spinnaker pipelines
Persistent volume storage for PMM data
Upgrade process with volume snapshots and rollback plan
Adjustable readiness probes for smooth upgrades
